text:
M1 Finance - Downtown Chicago, IL (onsite only) www.m1finance.com Your money when you need it, invested when you don't. We are a Chicago based automated investing start up.

We are looking for an onsite ANDROID ENGINEER to join our all star team of engineers and help to build our application from scratch. Must have Android SDK & have published at least 2 consumer facing Apps to the Google Play store.

To get in touch with us, send your resume to Amy @ a.mccoy@m1finance.com
